pageProduct.name: Provoke Touch Of Silver Toning Treatment Mask 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Toning treatment mask, for blonde, platinum or white hair.  With hydrating Aquaplex.
Neutralises brassiness & nourishes damaged hair in just one wash

Common Uses

For toning and hydration for weak, bleached, over processed and damaged hair
Unique function of depositing colour tone while deeply moisturising. Aquaplex™ is a new system that blends a unique set of active ingredients with hydration to create the ultimate nourishing formula for blonde hair

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Chloride, Hydrogenated Castor Oil/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Glycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium Edta, Isopropyl Alcohol, Linalool, Panthenol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Avena Strigosa Seed Extract, Lecithin, Hydroxycitronellal, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Disodium Distyrylbiphenyl Disulfonate, Acid Violet 43.

Directions

Recommended use after using Colour Care Shampoo
Apply on wet hair, for weekly use or when your cool blonde needs a treatment against brassy
Perfect for dry, damaged or bleached hair
